# Die Route
```{r projects, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(sp)
library(sf)
library(rgdal)
library(rprojroot)

## get gpx track
tag1 <- readOGR(paste0(getwd(), "/gpx.gpx"), layer = "tracks", verbose = FALSE)

# add gpx tracks
leaflet() %>%
  # add gpx tracks
  addPolylines(data=tag1, color = "red") %>%

  # add special points

  addTiles() # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
```
